Package org.bukkit.inventory

Interface Inventory

All Known Subinterfaces:
PlayerInventory
All Known Implementing Classes:
CraftInventory, CraftInventoryPlayer
public interface Inventory
Interface to the various inventories

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the inventory
      Returns:
      The inventory size

    • getName

      String getName()
      Return the name of the inventory
      Returns:
      The inventory name

    • getItem

      ItemStack getItem(int index)
      Get the ItemStack found in the slot at the given index
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the Slot's ItemStack to return
      Returns:
      The ItemStack in the slot

    • setItem

      void setItem(int index, ItemStack item)
      Stores the ItemStack at the given index
      Parameters:
      index - The index where to put the ItemStack
      item - The ItemStack to set

    • addItem

      HashMap<Integer,ItemStack> addItem(ItemStack... items)
      Stores the given ItemStacks in the inventory. This will try to fill existing stacks and empty slots as good as it can. It will return a HashMap of what it couldn't fit.
      Parameters:
      items - The ItemStacks to add
      Returns:

    • removeItem

      HashMap<Integer,ItemStack> removeItem(ItemStack... items)
      Removes the given ItemStacks from the inventory. It will try to remove 'as much as possible' from the types and amounts you give as arguments. It will return a HashMap of what it couldn't remove.
      Parameters:
      items - The ItemStacks to remove
      Returns:

    • getContents

      ItemStack[] getContents()
      Get all ItemStacks from the inventory
      Returns:
      All the ItemStacks from all slots

    • setContents

      void setContents(ItemStack[] items)
      Set the inventory's contents

    • contains

      boolean contains(int materialId)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks with the given materialId
      Parameters:
      materialId - The materialId to check for
      Returns:
      If any ItemStacks were found

    • contains

      boolean contains(Material material)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks with the given material
      Parameters:
      material - The material to check for
      Returns:
      If any ItemStacks were found

    • contains

      boolean contains(ItemStack item)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks matching the given ItemStack This will only match if both the type and the amount of the stack match
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to match against
      Returns:
      If any matching ItemStacks were found

    • contains

      boolean contains(int materialId, int amount)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks with the given materialId and at least the minimum amount specified
      Parameters:
      materialId - The materialId to check for
      amount - The minimum amount to look for
      Returns:
      If any ItemStacks were found

    • contains

      boolean contains(Material material, int amount)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks with the given material and at least the minimum amount specified
      Parameters:
      material - The material to check for
      Returns:
      If any ItemStacks were found

    • contains

      boolean contains(ItemStack item, int amount)
      Check if the inventory contains any ItemStacks matching the given ItemStack and at least the minimum amount specified This will only match if both the type and the amount of the stack match
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to match against
      Returns:
      If any matching ItemStacks were found

    • all

      HashMap<Integer,? extends ItemStack> all(int materialId)
      Find all slots in the inventory containing any ItemStacks with the given materialId
      Parameters:
      materialId - The materialId to look for
      Returns:
      The Slots found.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The Slots found.

      HashMap<Integer,? extends ItemStack> all(ItemStack item)
      Find all slots in the inventory containing any ItemStacks with the given ItemStack This will only match slots if both the type and the amount of the stack match
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to match against
      Returns:
      The Slots found.

      Remove all stacks in the inventory matching the given material.
      Parameters:
      material - The material to remove

    • remove

      void remove(ItemStack item)
      Remove all stacks in the inventory matching the given stack. This will only match a slot if both the type and the amount of the stack match
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to match against

    • clear

      void clear(int index)
      Clear out a particular slot in the index
      Parameters:
      index - The index to empty.
